text: North Arlington is a borough in Bergen County, New Jersey, United States. As of the 2020 United States Census, the borough population was 16,457. As the site of Holy Cross Cemetery, which has interred over 250,000 individuals since its establishment in 1915, North Arlington has over 15 times more dead people than living.Holy Cross Cemetery, Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Newark. Retrieved February 15, 2007. ==References== Category:Boroughs in Bergen County, New Jersey Category:1896 establishments in the United States Category:1890s establishments in New Jersey
title: North Arlington, New Jersey
